@@ -408,2 +404,2 @@
-     * The {@code deriveKey} method may be called multiple times on a particular
-     * {@code KDF} instance.

@@ -477,2 +473,3 @@

-        return null;

@@ -484,2 +481,2 @@
-     * The {@code deriveData} method may be called multiple times on a

@@ -547,2 +543,3 @@
